title: Enable ETH to BSC bridge using BURN mechanism
body: Today ETH to BSC swaps work using balance in the pool which got drained causing it to CLOSE and effect many users. Instead of using a predefined pool I propose to use BURN mechanism. In BURN tokens will be burnt on one chain and created on another chain when swap happens thus improving price and reducing supply which benefits all users while making it available all the time (24 X 7). This should work for BSC to ETH too.
author: 0xD20EBd94b35a96A78F6a651D179dCb07026293Ab
